name: sharp
description: Processes images with Sharp, the high-performance Node.js library for resizing, converting, and optimizing images. Use when building image pipelines, generating thumbnails, batch processing client photos, or optimizing uploads server-side. Use when: resizing photos, converting to WebP/AVIF, batch optimization, thumbnail generation, watermarks. Errors: Input file is missing, unsupported image format, memory allocation failed, sharp: Installation failed.
